Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class Game extends java.awt.Canvas implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • strategy

          java.awt.image.BufferStrategy strategy
          The stragey that allows us to use accelerate page flipping

        • gameRunning

          boolean gameRunning
          True if the game is currently "running", i.e. the game loop is looping

        • entities

          java.util.ArrayList<E> entities
          The list of all the entities that exist in our game

        • removeList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> removeList
          The list of entities that need to be removed from the game this loop

        • ship

          Entity ship
          The entity representing the player

        • moveSpeed

          double moveSpeed
          The speed at which the player's ship should move (pixels/sec)

        • lastFire

          long lastFire
          The time at which last fired a shot

        • firingInterval

          long firingInterval
          The interval between our players shot (ms)

        • alienCount

          int alienCount
          The number of aliens left on the screen

        • message

          java.lang.String message
          The message to display which waiting for a key press

        • waitingForKeyPress

          boolean waitingForKeyPress
          True if we're holding up game play until a key has been pressed

        • leftPressed

          boolean leftPressed
          True if the left cursor key is currently pressed

        • rightPressed

          boolean rightPressed
          True if the right cursor key is currently pressed

        • firePressed

          boolean firePressed
          True if we are firing

        • logicRequiredThisLoop

          boolean logicRequiredThisLoop
          True if game logic needs to be applied this loop, normally as a result of a game event
